about_the_game:
The purpose of this DLC is to support the developer and for the development of Missions Mode, which is available for free.
As thanks, you'll gain access to a new skin for Ghost that can be used in Missions Mode and also, upon completion of all of the missions, in the main campaign.



IMPORTANT: You do NOT need this DLC to have access to "Missions Mode".

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce) There can be problems with INTEL graphic cards
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To play normally, screen must be no smaller than 1280x720. Best resolution is 1920x1080. There can be problems with INTEL graphic cards
